description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. What happens when you take lemmings, add some worms, throw in some birds (that are angry), then pit them against an army of ants? you get Adamant Ants! Excavate, climb, fly and explode your way to rescue the ant queen from the diabolical bird and worm army in PART 2 of the series! With hours of fun and stimulating gameplay, fully destructible terrain, and loads of ant ability upgrades!
